mapper.select: select `t_optometry_id`,`student_id`,`checkor_id`,`first_check_vd`,`first_check_rps`,`first_check_lps`,`first_check_rcs`, `first_check_lcs`,`check_date`,date_format(s_result_optometry.check_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as checkDate1,`second_check_vd`,`second_check_rps`,`second_check_lps`,`second_check_rcs`,`second_check_lcs`, `delete_flag`,first_check_pd ,second_check_pd,`identity_card` from s_result_optometry where identity_card = #{value} GROUP BY check_date
mapper.insert: insert into s_result_optometry ( `student_id`, `checkor_id`, `first_check_vd`, `first_check_rps`, `first_check_lps`, `first_check_rcs`, `first_check_lcs`, `check_date`, `second_check_vd`, `second_check_rps`, `second_check_lps`, `second_check_rcs`, `second_check_lcs`, `delete_flag`, first_check_pd , second_check_pd ) values ( #{studentId}, #{checkorId}, #{firstCheckVd}, #{firstCheckRps}, #{firstCheckLps}, #{firstCheckRcs}, #{firstCheckLcs}, #{checkDate}, #{secondCheckVd}, #{secondCheckRps}, #{secondCheckLps}, #{secondCheckRcs}, #{secondCheckLcs}, #{deleteFlag}, #{firstCheckPd}, #{secondCheckPd} )
mapper.delete:
delete from s_result_optometry where t_optometry_id in
#{tOptometryId}
